name: A Delightful Night
description:
You play as Jorge, a small detective on his way home after a gig. Coming across an unfortunate accident on the road

or is it?

Leading to a unusual manor, there might be more to it than on the surface.

This is a first look into a upcoming game A Delightful Night. A brief demo to let you in manor of puzzles.  Be mindful of how unpolished it is.
